Enhancing Browser Archive

29 Aug 1999

I know a lot of browsers have been added since browsers.evolt.org went live, but I realized that you wouldn't know this unless you read thelist or talked to Adrian or went through the list. So...how about a "what's new" page? It could be pretty simple, ie:

\n8-28-99: Added Netbrowser's ReallyKoolBrowser 1.0 (Mac version)

\n8-22-99: Added CoolSoftware's Browser4Dummies beta version (PC and Mac).
